About TL;DR ・ Developer
If you really want to hear about it, the first thing you’ll probably want to know is where I was born, and what my lousy childhood was like, and how my parents were occupied and all before they had me, and all that David Copperfield kind of crap, but I don’t feel like going into it, if you want to know the truth. In the first place, that stuff bores me, and in the second place, my parents would have about two hemorrhages apiece if I told anything pretty personal about them. They’re quite touchy about anything like that, especially my father. They’re nice and all —I’m not saying that—but they’re also touchy as hell.
— Holden Caulfield.

I’m Enrique, software developer based in Spain and currently Android, PHP, Ruby, JavaScript pays my bills. Ideally, this site should contain a collection of curated, beautifully written, inspiring, and interesting posts, but in terms of writing I’m just a dilettante.

Apart from working and writing about technical stuff, I spend my spare time reading, watching movies, drawing, running, and improving my guitar skills. If you want to know about my professional career, check out my résumé.

Whenever you are interested, just send me a message to enrmarc@gmail.com. I use that handle in some other sites like GitHub and Stackoverflow.

About this site

Jekyll — GitHub — Atom

Built using Jekyll, Git, Atom (sometimes Vim) and hosted on GitHub. The design is strongly inspired by Pollen. Posts are under the Creative Commons license.
